member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Git.Client.GitClientProxy
member.summary: Base class for all proxy objects in the VersionControl.Client namespace.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Git.Client.WebServiceLayer.QueryBranch(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if the given branch exists and if so, return the GitRef for it branchName should be in its short form: 'master' instead of 'refs/heads/master'
